title: Babylisspro TT Tourmaline Titanium Travel Dryer, Red
description: Why sacrifice your hair while vacationing? Enjoy professional class hair drying with the Babyliss Tourmaline Mini Folding Travel 1000 Watt Hair Dryer. Tourmaline is a natural source of negative ions and far-infrared heat. Negative Ions eliminate frizz and close the cuticle to create smooth, shiny hair. Dual Voltage allows for worldwide usage. Pure tourmaline gemstones fused with ceramic.

title: Olay Total Effects Anti-Aging Night Firming Treatment - 1.7 Fl Oz
description: For those concerned about accelerating signs of aging, especially lack of firmness, this nightly moisturizer provides the benefit of 7 anti-aging therapies in 1 essential product all while you sleep. Subtle Lifting: Hydration for firmer skin appearance. Line Minimization: Reduces the appearance of fine wrinkles. Nourishing Moisturization: For a radiant, healthy glow. Tone Enhancement: Balances color & reduces appearance of age spots. Gentle Exfoliation: Smoothes and evens skin texture. Pore Refinement: Minimizes the appearance of pores. Free Radical Defense: Helps prevent damage to skin’s surface. Visibly firmer, younger-looking skin every morning. It provides the total anti-aging power of moisture with a complex of vitamins, anti-oxidants and wheat protein. THIS EXCLUSIVE FORMULA IS: Dermatologically tested, Non-Comedogenic (won’t clog pores).

title: Albolene, Cleanser Cream Unscented - 6 oz
description: SKU NUMBER: 63842.The Mininimum EXP date on product:1year.TITLE DESCRIPTION: Albolene, Cleanser Cream Unscented - 6 oz.MANUFACTURER: NUMARK LABORATORIES INC.PRODUCT DESCRIPTION: Albolene Moisturizing Cleanser liquifies on contact with your skin to gently and thoroughly dissolve makeup, dirt, and even mascara.INGREDIENTS: Mineral Oil, Petrolatium, Paraffin, Ceresin, Beta Carotene. SUGGESTED USE: Smooth on Albolene Moisturizing Cleanser, tissue off and see how much cleaner and softer your skin can be. Leaves no soap-and-water dryness. Used daily, Albolene helps skin stay soft and younger looking.

title: It's A 10 Miracle Hair Mask , 8-Ounces Jars
description: 1. Detangles 2. Restores Moisture 3. Instantly Restores Elasticity 4. Softens 5. Smoothes 6. Imparts Luminous Shine 7. Enhances Natural Body 8. Nourishes 9. Defrizzes 10. Improves color vibrancy

title: Sebastian Penetraitt Deep Strengthening and Repair Masque Unisex, 5.1 Ounce
description:
Sebastian Penetraitt STRENGTHENING and REPAIR MASK 5.1 oz / 150 ml

Stress guard.  Repairs and strengthens hair weakened from past chemical treatments and heat damage. 

Remove excess water from hair.  Saturate evenly focusing on most damaged areas.  Leave on for 2-3 minutes.  Rinse thoroughly.
Best for stressed, dull and chemically damaged hair

title: Schwarzkopf BC Bonacure Repair Rescue Sealed Ends 2.6 oz (color packaging may vary)
description: Bonacure Repair Sealed Ends - repair rescue for damaged or bleached hair. Bonacure Repair Sealed Ends repairs hair breakage, seals and prevents split ends. CuraTec Proteins and the amino acid Glycine, aid the repair of split or broken ends. Softens and improves the combability of dry and brittle ends. Apply small amount of Bonacure Repair Sealed Ends to wet or dry hair. Smooth through the hair ends with the fingertips. Do not rinse out. Apply Bonacure Repair Sealed Ends to dry hair for general smoothing and sealing. (2.6 oz)

title: Schwarzkopf Professional Bonacure Repair Rescue Treatment 6.8 fl oz (200 ml)
description: Bonacure by Bonacure REPAIR RESCUE TREATMENT 6.8OZ

title: Obagi Medical Sun Shield Broad Spectrum SPF 50 Matte Sunscreen Lotion, 3 Ounce
description: Award-winning sunscreen provides a high level of protection against harmful UVA and UVB rays. Non-greasy, PABA-free, and fragrance-free formula for all skin types that applies completely sheer in an elegant matte finish that feels great on your skin.

title: Topix Pharm SPF 40 Citrix Antioxidant Sunscreen, 3.5 Fluid Ounce
description: Citrix Vitamin C Antioxidant Sunscreen Broad Spectrum SPF 40 (formerly Antioxidant Sunscreen SPF 30) protects against damaging UVA and UVB rays to prevent sunburns and photo-aging. Formulated with a blend of antioxidant-rich green tea, and vitamins A, C and E, it combats free-radical damage to promote healthy, youthful-looking skin. Offers up to 80 minutes of water-resistant protection.

title: L'Oreal Paris RevitaLift Anti-Wrinkle + Firming Face & Neck Contour Cream, 1.7 Fluid Ounce
description: This unique daily moisturizer delivers anti-wrinkle and firming action, created specially to care for your face and neck.  Experience advanced action against the signs of aging wth smoother, firmer skin in just 4 weeks. RevitaLift Anti-Wrinkle + Firming Face & Neck Contour Cream with Pro-Retinol A and Stimuplex increases cell turnover, reduces wrinkles, firms skin, and provides 24 hour moisturization.

title: Cellulite Massager Roller -Anti Cellulite Remover - Reduce Cellulite - Cellulite Brush - Remove Cellulite - Cellulite Cure - Anti Cellulite Treatment - Cellulite Reduction - Cellulite Removal - Lose Cellulite - Anti Cellulite Roller To Be Used With Cellulite Cream or Cellulite Oil. 100% NO Questions, NO Hassle Money Back/Replacement Guarantee for 90 Days!
description: The Best Cellulite Massager You'll Need To Banish Bad Skin! Begin your Journey to Smoother, Flawless Skin Today!25 years and over 100 clinical studies validate massaging and its effect on cellulite and reducing the circumference of the fatty tissue at the area of the treated cellulite. Massage stimulation is regularly shown to significantly reduce the circumference of the thigh through lipolysis (fat reduction) and improve the appearance of cellulite.PROVEN AND EFFECTIVE- Replenish and repair your skin's smoothness and fights to reduce presence of unsightly fatty deposits- Re-activates cellular activity by mechanically stimulating your skin using a pleasant and non-aggressive technique- Vigorous massage increases blood flow, remove toxins and reduce excess fluid in cellulite-prone areas- Tightens, tones, restores and firms the appearance of your skinDURABLE AND DISTINCTIVE- Exclusively designed and patented handle is virtually indestructible, won't disintegrate over time, and allows wide variety of hand positions without slipping or falling- Specially-designed roller balls are long-lasting and deliver a milder, more consistent feelRELAXING- Tackle tension, invigorate your skin, help stimulate circulation for a radiant glow and soothing relief to your whole bodyTREATMENT AND USAGEMake the Scala massage mitt a key part of your anti cellulite treatment plan along with a healthy, balanced diet and exercise to battle cellulite over time- Lather up body with cellulite cream or oil- Massage buttocks, thighs, or other body parts in a circular motion- Do not use on dry skin
